entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. High 23. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
